A better way to buy

Real convenience and trusted advice without the pressure to buy

  • Browse the best

    See great deals on cars that passed our rigorous, 150+ point inspection.

  • Test drives, delivered

    We'll bring the car to you and be there to answer any questions.

  • No-hassle buying

    Let us handle all the paperwork. We can even help with financing options.

Get a detailed look

We collect and show you all the details about the car up front. Each car we feature has high-resolution photos, specs, vehicle history, and results from our 150+ point inspection.

See for yourself
150+ point inspection

Our professional Reconditioning Advisors give you a full report of their 150+ point inspection. They also carefully review service records, vehicle history report, and any other ownership details. This way, you'll have peace of mind knowing the comprehensive health of the car before you buy.

  • Engine
  • Transmission
  • Electrical
  • Suspension
  • Cooling
  • Brakes
See the full Shift inspection process

We want to know everything about every car we list. To do this, each car undergoes a thorough inspection process, from initial appraisal to a mechanical deep dive into all systems and components of the vehicle.

Initial inspection app

Our Concierges are equipped with proprietary technology to record any and all findings from the very first time they see a car. Interviewing the seller and recording the history of the car allows us to get a jump start on any issues that might need to be addressed before the car is listed for sale. We also require all sellers using the site to be transparent about any imperfections in their cars.

Exhaustive mechanic checklist

Certified, licensed mechanics dig deeper into the car to inspect the machine itself. They make sure that everything is operating as it should be, and make any replacements or tune-ups so the car is as good as new when it gets into a buyer’s hands. We share the results of this inspection with all buyers on the following criteria:

Engine

  • Noise
  • Motor mounts
  • Exhaust leak
  • Oil level/condition
  • Oil leaks/seals/gaskets
  • Turbo/supercharger
  • Smoke
  • Driveability

Salesmen? Nope.

A Concierge’s goal isn’t to sell you a car, it’s to make sure you have a great experience buying one.

Meet our Concierges

Don't just love your car, love buying it

Let us handle the small print

You don't love paperwork. Luckily, we do. Let us handle the DMV forms, title transfer, and registration. We also take care of the coordination between the seller, lender, and everyone involved.

Financing with less frustration

Your Concierge can help you with financing options. While Shift doesn't provide financing, we partner with excellent lenders offering competitive rates and seamless service. We're also happy to work with the lender of your choice.
